# Advanced Data Science

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository is to render the website https://jh-adv-data-sci.github.io/ for the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health course "Advanced Data Science" for the Department of Biostatistics. 

## Rendering

To render the website, you can run:
```bash
quarto render
```

This is done automatically using [GitHub Actions](.github/workflows/publish.yml)
